Detailed Description

Base class for MatrixReadOperators.

Author:
Lee Netherton
A MatrixReadOperator is a class which will perform a read operation on a matrix. The MatrixReadOperator class is never instantiated directly, but serves as a base for derived operator classes. It provides basic read operatons for its derivatives.
